tdd_tests.description: Should automatically generate complete sprint planning documentation
tdd_tests.expected_behavior: Creates sprint goal, backlog, and definition of done from high-level objectives

tdd_tests.description: Should monitor and update sprint progress based on commit and task completion
tdd_tests.expected_behavior: Updates burndown charts and progress metrics without manual intervention

tdd_tests.description: Should analyze sprint data and generate retrospective insights
tdd_tests.expected_behavior: Produces actionable retrospective data including what worked, improvements, and metrics

tdd_tests.description: Should use historical data to improve future sprint planning
tdd_tests.expected_behavior: Adjusts velocity estimates and capacity planning based on past performance

requirements.security: Read-only access to repository data with secure API token handling
requirements.scalability: Support multiple concurrent sprints across different repositories
